title: Ideal gas law - compare number of moles

content.question: Samples <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> and <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> of different monatomic ideal gases are in separate containers with the same volume. Both gases have the same pressure, but Sample <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> has a greater temperature than Sample <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math>. Which of the following correctly compares the number <math alttext="n sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>n</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math> of moles in Sample <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> to the number <math alttext="n sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>n</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math> of moles in Sample <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="n sub A is less than n sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>n</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>n</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>
<math alttext="n sub A equals n sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>n</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>n</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>
<math alttext="n sub A is greater than n sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>n</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>n</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>
The comparison cannot be made without knowing the relative masses of the gas atoms.

content.answer: <math alttext="n sub A is less than n sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>n</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>n</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
